headline: Is Vertex Pharmaceuticals (VRTX) Pricing Reflect Long Term Cash Flow Potential After Recent Pullback
summary: Wondering if Vertex Pharmaceuticals at around US$470 a share is offering fair value, or if you are paying up for quality, you are not alone in asking that question. The stock is around US$470.52 after a 1.5% decline over the last 7 days, a 4.8% gain over 30 days, a 4.1% gain year to date, and a 3.7% decline over the past year, on top of a 60.4% return over 3 years and 121.4% over 5 years. Recent news coverage has focused on Vertex Pharmaceuticals as a key player in the large cap biotech...
